thread.title: Auctioning dazzling bras for a cure
thread.title_full: Auctioning dazzling bras for a cure

author: Krista Driscoll
title: Auctioning dazzling bras for a cure
text: Expand Photo Townsend Bessent | Townsend@vaildaily.com | Linda Zerangue's piece for the Bradazzled event titled "The Cure" is seen at her home in Edwards on Thursday. The piece brings to light that the fight against breast cancer isn't isolated to this country, but is something that woman around the world are dealing with. The bra is one of a dozen that will be part of a silent auction at Bradazzled, a fundraiser for the Vail Breast Cancer Awareness Group and The Sonnenalp Breast Center at the Shaw Regional Cancer Center. The event takes place from 5:30 to 8 p.m. Wednesday at Galerie Zuger in Solaris, 141 E. Meadow Drive in Vail. There's a $10 suggested donation for admission, and bra bids begin at $100 to $250. For more information, call 970-479-8595 or visit www.vailbreastcancerawareness.org. Â«
